title: An Evening with Friends
description: A casual evening in the Gryffindor common room turns into a heartfelt conversation between best friends.

beats.title: Catching Up
beats.description: It's a peaceful evening in the common room. The three friends are just relaxing and chatting about their day, classes, and life at Hogwarts.
objectives: Joke around and enjoy each other's company
Eventually bring up something more serious

beats.title: Something's Bothering Harry
beats.description: The conversation takes a more serious turn as Harry reveals that something has been bothering him. His friends listen and offer support.
objectives: Harry shares what's been on his mind
Ron and Hermione offer their perspectives
Come up with a plan or solution together

beats.title: Making Plans
beats.description: The trio decides on their next steps. They make plans for what they'll do tomorrow or how they'll handle the situation.
objectives: Agree on a course of action
